New Records: Klaus Gjasula scored an own goal for Croatia
Klaus Gjasula scored a last-gasp equalizer for Albania
Key Match Events: Klaus Gjasula's own goal turned into Croatia's goal
Klaus Gjasula scored the decisive equalizer in stoppage time
Pre-Game Insights: The match was the first competitive meeting between Croatia and Albania
Croatia struggled to create chances in the first half
Post-Match Reflections: Croatia's players were disappointed with the result
Albania's coach expressed pride in the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match ended in a 2-2 draw
Klaus Gjasula became the first player to score for both teams in a competitive match between Croatia and Albania
